refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The acknowledgements section of a book or other component provides the author(s) with a place to identify individuals, organizations, and other sources of support and to acknowledge their contributions to the work.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: In books, usually introduces a forced page break and often starts on the next recto page. In smaller components, such as articles, it may simply appear as another section.
